title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed calls as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLMs and chat models with full LangChain tooling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starter included.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete, embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with any Ollama model with syntax highlighting & history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completion and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official model library manifests (Llama3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Gemma, etc.) consumable by Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG with Chroma, function calling, vision, voice chat, fine-tune, CI examples.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rag-qa-bot
summary: Streamlit app template for PDF Q&A using local Ollama + Chroma vector store; one-command startup.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Nim language client for Ollama; lightweight, statically compiled, supports streaming chat & generate.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK for Ollama; NuGet package with chat, generate, embeddings, and MAUI sample.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 or GCP instances with Ollama server pre-installed.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama; inline prompts, summarize, translate, continue text.
